factions.description: The Space Marine Legions of the Great Crusade and Horus Heresy
factions.name: Legiones Astartes

factions.description: The Adeptus Mechanicus and their war machines
factions.name: Adeptus Mechanicum

factions.description: The noble houses of Imperial Knights
factions.name: Questoris Familia

factions.description: The elite regiments of the Imperial Army, representing the finest human soldiers in the galaxy
factions.name: Solar Auxilia

factions.description: The I Legion, the First and the most secretive of all Legions
factions.name: Dark Angels (I Legion)

factions.description: The III Legion, perfectionists and masters of close combat
factions.name: Emperor's Children (III Legion)

factions.description: The IV Legion, masters of siege warfare and artillery
factions.name: Iron Warriors (IV Legion)

factions.description: The V Legion, masters of lightning warfare and mounted combat
factions.name: White Scars (V Legion)

factions.description: The VI Legion, the Wolves of Fenris and savage warriors
factions.name: Space Wolves (VI Legion)

factions.description: The VII Legion, masters of siege warfare and fortification
factions.name: Imperial Fists (VII Legion)

factions.description: The VIII Legion, terror incarnate and masters of psychological warfare
factions.name: Night Lords (VIII Legion)

factions.description: The IX Legion, noble warriors with a dark secret in their blood
factions.name: Blood Angels (IX Legion)

factions.description: The X Legion, masters of technology and cybernetic enhancement
factions.name: Iron Hands (X Legion)

factions.description: The XII Legion, berserkers who seek close combat above all else
factions.name: World Eaters (XII Legion)

factions.description: The XIII Legion, masters of tactical warfare and the Codex Astartes
factions.name: Ultramarines (XIII Legion)

factions.description: The XIV Legion, masters of biological warfare and endurance
factions.name: Death Guard (XIV Legion)

factions.description: The XV Legion, masters of psychic powers and sorcery
factions.name: Thousand Sons (XV Legion)

factions.description: The XVI Legion, the Warmaster's own and masters of precision strikes
factions.name: Luna Wolves (XVI Legion)

factions.description: The XVII Legion, the first to fall to Chaos and masters of faith
factions.name: Word Bearers (XVII Legion)

factions.description: The XVIII Legion, masters of fire and the forge
factions.name: Salamanders (XVIII Legion)

factions.description: The XIX Legion, masters of stealth and guerrilla warfare
factions.name: Raven Guard (XIX Legion)

factions.description: The XX Legion, masters of deception and infiltration
factions.name: Alpha Legion (XX Legion)
